--- title: Scraping the Bundestag page keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Didn't get the webdrivers to work yet and found that manual scraping is okayish." description: "Didn't get the webdrivers to work yet and found that manual scraping is okayish." nb_path: "nbs/00_browser_thingies.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options as ChromeOptions
from selenium.webdriver.firefox.options import Options as FirefoxOptions
from pathlib import Path
import os
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
driver_path = Path('../drivers')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
os.listdir(driver_path)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
options = ChromeOptions()
options.headless = True
options.binary_location = str(driver_path/'chromedriver')
options.add_argument('--disable-dev-shm-usage')
options.add_argument('--no-sandbox')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
type(str(driver_path/'chromedriver'))
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=options,
                          executable_path=str(driver_path/'chromedriver'))
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
options = FirefoxOptions()
options.headless = True
# options.binary_location = str(driver_path/'geckodriver')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
driver = webdriver.Firefox(options=options,
                           executable_path=str(driver_path/'geckodriver'))
{% endraw %}
